citations.narrative:
The licensee has not sampled his dogs for heartworm in the past year. Not sampling the dogs for heartworm in
accordance with a scheduled approved by the Attending Veterinarian doesn't ensure the population of dogs is being
adequately monitored and protected from heartworm disease. The licensee must sample the population of dogs for
heartworm in accordance with a schedule approved by his Attending Veterinarian. Correct by 6/28/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The licensee has not sampled his dogs for heartworm in the past year. Not sampling the dogs for heartworm in 
accordance with a scheduled approved by the Attending Veterinarian doesn't ensure the population of dogs is being 
adequately monitored and protected from heartworm disease. The licensee must sample the population of dogs for 
heartworm in accordance with a schedule approved by his Attending Veterinarian. Correct by 6/28/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
